mapper.sql: id, uuid, is_deleted, create_time, order_code, delete_time, remarks, attachment, is_publish, owner, owner_type, name, start_time, end_time, duration, live_price, record_price, room_id, timetable_id, is_free, live_status, buy_number, browse_number, hd_url, sd_url, fluent_url, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5, thumbnail, share_path, is_private, stream_key, publish_url, rtmp_url, hls_url, hdl_url, snapshot_url
mapper.select: select c.id as chapter_id,c.name as chapter_name, c.owner,c.owner_type,c.start_time,c.end_time, c.live_price,c.record_price,c.browse_number, c.room_id,c.is_free,c.introduction,c.remarks1 as thumbnail, c.remarks2,u.name,u.head_pic,u.fans_num from (select id,name,owner,owner_type,start_time, end_time,live_price,record_price,browse_number, room_id,is_free,introduction,remarks2, live_status,remarks1 from t_yp_live_chapter_plan where is_deleted=0 and is_publish=2 and live_status=2 order by remarks2 desc limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}) c, (select id,name,head_pic,fans_num from t_yp_user_tech where is_deleted=0) u where c.owner=u.id order by c.remarks2 desc

select
,
from t_yp_live_chapter_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted=0 and is_publish=2
